text: woman I know that look . Then you get really quiet . So are you gon na tell me ?
lori_grimes We had a fight this morning . It got ugly . Hurtful .
woman I 'm sorry , hon . Men can be jerks .
lori_grimes Thing is , if we 're being honest , he was n't the asshole .
woman Ah , gotcha .

lori_grimes He was trying so hard to be reasonable , it just pushed my buttons all the more . God , I sometimes wish he would just have it out with me and blow up , tell me I 'm being a bitch if that 's what I 'm being . Instead he 's just so .
woman Do n't beat yourself up .
lori_grimes No ? You ca n't tell me that being pissed at your husband because he does n't yell at you is even close to being rational .
woman That 's one problem I do n't have with Tom .
lori_grimes But you still love him .
woman Sure I do . Might as well . We 're lifers .
lori_grimes I admire your pragmatism .
woman You still love Rick ?

lori_grimes I 've been asking myself that a lot . And I think the answer 's yes . It 's just I 'm trying to remember how that works . Maybe the only real problem we have is we got married so young and it's-- .
lori_grimes Excuse me . Is he alive ?
shane_walsh He 's in surgery .
lori_grimes How ?

shane_walsh There was a radio call that said that there was two suspects in a car . But there was a third man . Somebody screwed up . I screwed up . I did not see him in time . Lori , it 's my fault .
lori_grimes I do n't believe that . What do I say ? How do I tell my son his father 's been shot ?
shane_walsh You do n't have to do it alone .
lori_grimes Okay theme music playing ] .
rick_grimes Come on .
shane_walsh Hey , you move , shithead . Come on . Get us there .
rick_grimes How far ? How far ? !
otis Another half mile that way . Hershel . Talk to Hershel . He 'll help your boy .
otis I 'm sorry .
shane_walsh Let 's go . Come on !
maggie_greene Dad !
hershel_greene Was he bit ?
rick_grimes Shot . By your man .
patricia Otis ?
rick_grimes He said find hershel is that you ? Help me . Help my boy .
hershel_greene Get him inside . Patricia , I need my full kit . Maggie , painkillers , coagulates -- grab everything . Clean towels , sheets , alcohol . In here . Pillowcase .
rick_grimes Is he alive ?
hershel_greene Pillowcase , quick .
rick_grimes Is he alive ?
hershel_greene Fold it . Make a pad . Put pressure on the wound . I 've got a heartbeat . It 's faint .
patricia I got it , step back .
hershel_greene Maggie , IV .
maggie_greene We need some place .
hershel_greene Your name ?
rick_grimes rick .
hershel_greene Rick ?
rick_grimes I'm -- I'm rick .
hershel_greene Rick , we 're gon na do everything we can , okay ? You need to give us some room . Now .
otis I 'm sorry .
shane_walsh Move !
otis He 's alive ? He 's still alive ?
shane_walsh Hey . okay . It 's okay . You got blood , man . Okay . I 'll take it from you . Where is he ? Where is he ? Is he okay ?
hershel_greene You know his blood type ?
rick_grimes A - positive , same as mine .
hershel_greene That 's fortunate . Do n't wander far . I 'm gon na need you . What happened ?
otis I was tracking a buck . Bullet went through it .

hershel_greene When clean through . The deer slowed the bullet down , which certainly saved his life . But it did not go through clean . It broke up into pieces . If I get the bullet fragments out . and I 'm counting six .
otis I never saw him , not until he was on the ground .
rick_grimes lori does n't know ?
shane_walsh No .
rick_grimes My wife does n't know . My wife does n't know .
andrea_harrison You still worrying about it ?
lori_grimes It was a gunshot .
daryl_dixon We all heard it .
lori_grimes Why one ? Why just one gunshot ?
daryl_dixon Maybe they took down a walker .
lori_grimes Please do n't patronize me . You know rick would n't risk a gunshot to put down one walker . Or shane they 'd do it quietly .
carol_peletier Should n't they have caught up with us by now ?
daryl_dixon There 's nothing we can do about it anyway . Ca n't run around these woods chasing echoes .
lori_grimes So what do we do ?
daryl_dixon Same as we 've been . Beat the bush for Sophia , work our way back to the highway .
andrea_harrison I 'm sure they 'll hook up with us back at the RV . I 'm sorry for what you 're going through . I know how you feel .

carol_peletier I suppose you do . Thank you . The thought of her out here by herself . It 's the not knowing that 's killing me . I just keep hoping and praying she does n't wind up like Amy . Oh god . That 's the worst thing I ever said .
andrea_harrison We 're all hoping and praying with you , for what it 's worth .

daryl_dixon I 'll tell you what it 's worth -- not a damn thing . It 's a waste of time all this hoping and praying . 'Cause we 're gon na locate that little girl , she 's gon na be just fine . Am I the only one zen around here ? Good lord .
dale_horvath We are gon na have quite a collection of spare parts , I tell ya .
theodore_douglas Should n't they be back by now ?
dale_horvath It 's still light . Let 's not worry just yet . How are you feeling ? T - Dog ? I asked you how you were feeling just now . Please do n't blow that question off .
theodore_douglas It really really hurts . It 's throbbing something awful .
dale_horvath Oh , let me see .
theodore_douglas Ah ! Don't -- Don't touch it !
dale_horvath I 'm sorry . I 'm sorry . Listen , your veins are very discolored . You got a hell of an infection there . You could die from blood poisoning .
theodore_douglas Oh man . Would n't that be the way ? World gone to hell , the dead risen up to eat the living and Theodore Douglas gets done in by a cut on his arm .

dale_horvath Yeah , that would be -- that would be stupid . I 've been saying since yesterday , we 've got to get you some antibiotics . We 've been ransacking these cars the whole time . I ca n't believe that we have not found some ampicillin or something in the whole place . Can you ?
theodore_douglas Seems like there would be .
dale_horvath That 's what I think . Well , we , uh -- we have n't been through enough . So let 's look some more .
rick_grimes Why 'd I let him come with his ? I should have sent him with lori .
shane_walsh You know , you start that , you 'll never get that monkey off your back .
rick_grimes Little girl goes missing , you look for her . Simple . You said call it , head back .
shane_walsh Does n't matter what I said .
rick_grimes carl got shot because I would n't cut bait . It should be me in there .
shane_walsh You 've been there , partner . Right ? And you pulled through . So will he .
rick_grimes Is that why I got out of that hospital ? Found my family for it to end here like this ? This some kind of sick joke ?
shane_walsh You stop it . Just stop .
rick_grimes A little girl goes missing . you look for her . It 's plain and simple .
maggie_greene Rick . he needs blood .
hershel_greene You , hold him down .
carl_grimes Dad !
shane_walsh I got him .
hershel_greene Almost there .
rick_grimes Stop ! You 're killing him !
hershel_greene Rick , do you want him to live ?
patricia He needs blood .
shane_walsh Do it now !
shane_walsh Wait . Wait . Hey .
hershel_greene He just passed out . One down .
hershel_greene Five to go .
hershel_greene Pressure 's stable .
rick_grimes lori needs to be here . She does n't even know what 's going on . I 've got to go find her . Bring her back .
hershel_greene You ca n't do that .
rick_grimes She 's his mother . She needs to know what 's happened . Her son 's lying here shot .
hershel_greene And he 's going to need more blood . He ca n't go more than 50 feet from this bed .
shane_walsh Hey . Hey . Come on .
rick_grimes I 'm all right . I 'm all right .
shane_walsh I got him . He 's stable for now .
rick_grimes lori has to be here Shane , she has to know .
shane_walsh Okay , I get that . I 'm gon na handle it . But you 've got to handle your end .
rick_grimes My -- my end ?

shane_walsh Your end is being here for your son . Even if he did n't need your blood to survive , there is no way I 'd ever let you walk out that door . Man , I 'd break your legs if I tried . You know that , right ? If something happened to him and you were n't here . If -- If he slipped away while you were gone , you would never forgive yourself for that . And Neither would Lori , man .
rick_grimes You 're right .
shane_walsh When was I ever wrong ?

shane_walsh You know , when -- when you were in that hospital , the one you were never supposed to leave , man , you should have seen Lori . She was like . the strength of that woman . You ca n't imagine it . See -- see that 's what you 've got to have now . I mean , Carl -- he needs that from you . So you wire yourself tight , my friend .
rick_grimes Hmm ?
shane_walsh You hear ? You 've got the hard part . Just leave the rest to me , okay ?
rick_grimes All right .
shane_walsh All right .
hershel_greene He 's out of danger for the moment . But I need to remove those remaining fragments .
rick_grimes How ? You saw how he was .
hershel_greene I know , and that was the shallowest one . I need to go deeper to get the others .
shane_walsh Oh man .
hershel_greene There 's more .
rick_grimes Tell me .

hershel_greene His belly 's distended , his pressure is dropping , which means there 's internal bleeding . A fragment must have nicked one of the blood vessels . I have to open him up , find the bleeder and stitch it . And he ca n't move while I 'm in there -- I mean , at all . If he reacts the same as before , I 'll sever an artery and he 'll be dead in minutes . To even try this , I have to put him under . But if I do , he wo n't be able to breathe on his own . Same bad results .
rick_grimes What 'll it take ?
otis You need a respirator . What else ?
hershel_greene The tube that goes with it , extra surgical supplies , drapes , sutures .
rick_grimes If you had all that you could save him ?
hershel_greene If I had all that , I could try .
otis Nearest hospital went up in flames a month ago . The High School .
hershel_greene That 's what I was thinking . They set up a fema shelter there . They would have everything we need .
otis Place was overrun last time I saw it . You could n't get near it . Maybe It 's better now .
shane_walsh I said , leave the rest to me . Is It too late to take that back ?
rick_grimes I hate you going alone .
shane_walsh Come on . Doc , why do n't you do me a list and draw me a map ?
otis You wo n't need a map . I 'll take you there . Ai n't but five miles .
patricia Otis , no .
otis Honey , we do n't have time for guesswork and I 'm responsible . I ai n't gon na sit here while this fella takes this on alone . I 'll be all right .
shane_walsh Are you sure about this ?
otis Do you even know what any of the stuff he 's talking about looks like ?
shane_walsh Come to think , no .
otis I 've been a volunteer EMT . I do . We can talk about this till next Sunday or we could just go do it real quick .
shane_walsh I 'll take right quick .
rick_grimes I should thank you .
otis Wait till that boy of yours is up and around . Then we 'll talk . I 'll gather some things .
maggie_greene Where is she , your wife ?
daryl_dixon We 'll lose the light before too long . I think we should call it .
lori_grimes Let 's head back . We 'll pick it up again tomorrow ? Yeah , we 'll find her tomorrow .
rick_grimes Just get what you need and get out of there .
otis You stay strong , all right ? That 's a fine weapon , Rick . I 'll bring it back in good shape .
otis Only one I got .
shane_walsh Man , this turned into one strange day .
otis Did n't it though ?
hershel_greene Let 's check on your boy .
dale_horvath Found some more batteries , a bottle of very trendy pink water , an excellent new machete , and I thought glenn might like this guitar . Maybe he plays . No drugs . You ?
theodore_douglas Yeah , Ibuprofen and these . What are we doing ?
dale_horvath Pulling supplies together .
theodore_douglas No , I mean . what are we doing ? People off in the woods , they 're looking for that poor girl and we 're here . Why ? 'Cause they think we 're the weakest . What are you , 70 ?
dale_horvath 64 .
theodore_douglas Uh - huh . And I 'm the one black guy . Realize how precarious that makes my situation ?
dale_horvath What the hell are you talking about ?

theodore_douglas I 'm talking about two good - old - boy cowboy sheriffs and a redneck whose brother cut off his own hand because I dropped a key . Who in that scenario you think is gon na be first to get lynched ?

dale_horvath You ca n't be serious . Am I -- hey , am I missing something ? Those cowboys have done all right by us . And if I 'm not mistaken , that redneck went out of his way to save your ass -- more than once .
theodore_douglas And do n't forget about Andrea . Kills her own sister .
dale_horvath She was already dead .
theodore_douglas Than wants to blow herself up . Yeah , she 's all there .
dale_horvath She 's having a tough time . What is wrong with you ?
theodore_douglas The whole world is having a tough time . Damn , man . Open your eyes . Look where we are -- stuck in this mess here !
dale_horvath Shh !
theodore_douglas Let's -- let 's just go . Let 's just take the RV .
dale_horvath You 've gone off the deep end .
theodore_douglas I mean it , man . Why are we on the side of this road like live bait ? Let 's go , you and me . Let 's go before they get back .
dale_horvath Oh my god . You 're burning up . Give me that . Come on . Here , take these . We 've got to knock that fever down .
dale_horvath Where the hell are they ?
lori_grimes How much farther ?
daryl_dixon Not much . Maybe a hundred yards as the crow flies .
lori_grimes Too bad we 're not crows .
andrea_harrison Oh . Oh-- ! As the crow flies , my ass .
lori_grimes Andrea ?
maggie_greene Lori ? lori Grimes ? Whoa .
lori_grimes I 'm lori .
maggie_greene rick sent me . You 've got to come now .
lori_grimes What ?
maggie_greene There 's been an accident . Carl 's been shot . He 's still alive but you 've got to come now . rick needs you . Just come .
daryl_dixon Whoa whoa whoa . We do n't know this girl . You ca n't get on that horse .
maggie_greene rick said you had others on the highway , that big traffic snarl ?
glenn_rhee Uh - huh .
maggie_greene Backtrack to Fairburn road . Two miles down is our farm . You 'll see the mailbox . The name is Greene . Hyah !
daryl_dixon Shut up .
dale_horvath Shot ? What do you mean shot ?
glenn_rhee I do n't know , Dale . I was n't there . All I know is this chick rode out of nowhere like Zorro on a horse and took lori .
dale_horvath You let her ?
daryl_dixon Climb down out of my asshole , man . rick sent her . She knew Lori 's name and Carl 's .
dale_horvath I heard screams . Was that you ?
glenn_rhee She got attacked by a walker . It was a close call .
dale_horvath Andrea , are you all right ?
rick_grimes This place is beautiful .
hershel_greene Been in my family 160 years .
rick_grimes I ca n't believe how serene it is . How untouched . You 're lucky .
hershel_greene We were n't completely unscathed . We lost friends , neighbors . The epidemic took my wife , my stepson .
rick_grimes I 'm sorry .
hershel_greene My daughters were spared . I 'm grateful to god for that . These people here , all we 've got left is each other . Just hoping we can ride it out in peace till there 's a cure .
rick_grimes We were at the CDC . It 's gone now . There is no cure .

hershel_greene I do n't believe it . When aids came along , everyone panicked . One boy in town came down with it and some parents pulled their children from school so they did n't have to sit in the same room .
rick_grimes This is a whole other thing .
hershel_greene That 's what we always "say--""This" one 's different """" .
rick_grimes Well , this one is .
hershel_greene Mankind 's been fighting plagues from the start . We get our behinds kicked for a while then we bounce back . It 's nature correcting herself , restoring some balance .
rick_grimes I wish I could believe that .
rick_grimes I 'm sorry .
lori_grimes My boy . My baby boy . Baby boy . It 's okay . Mama 's here . Mama 's here . You 're gon na be okay . You 're gon na be okay . We 're gon na make you okay .
lori_grimes Slow . Slow . How many transfusions ?
rick_grimes Two . Only two .
lori_grimes He wanted to do the same for you when you were in the hospital . I had to talk him out of it .
rick_grimes Thank you .
lori_grimes Okay , so I understand , when shane gets back with this other man-- .
hershel_greene otis .
lori_grimes Otis . The idiot who shot my son .
hershel_greene Ma'am , It was an accident .
lori_grimes I 'll take that under advisement . For now he 's the idiot who shot our son .
rick_grimes Lori , they 're doing everything they can to make it right .
lori_grimes Okay , as soon as they get back you can perform this surgery ?
hershel_greene I 'll certainly do my best .
lori_grimes Okay . You 've done this procedure before ?
hershel_greene Well , yes , in a sense .
lori_grimes In a sense ?
rick_grimes Honey , we do n't have the luxury of shopping for a surgeon .
lori_grimes No , I understand that . But I mean you 're a doctor , right ?
hershel_greene Yes , ma'am . Of course . A vet .
lori_grimes A veteran ? A combat medic ?
hershel_greene A veterinarian .
lori_grimes And you 've done this surgery before on what ? Cows ? Pigs ?
rick_grimes I -- I have -- I have to sit .
lori_grimes Completely in over your head , are n't you ?
hershel_greene Ma'am , are n't we all ?
shane_walsh Shh shh . Okay , let 's take a look .
otis You see that big mobile medical trailer across the way ?
shane_walsh That 's where we got to get to ?
otis Yeah .
carol_peletier I wo n't do it . We ca n't just leave .
dale_horvath Carol , the group is split . We 're scattered and weak .
carol_peletier What if she comes back and we 're not here ? It could happen .
andrea_harrison If Sophia found her way back and we were gone , that would be awful .

daryl_dixon Okay . We got to plan for this . I say tomorrow morning is soon enough to pull up stakes . Give us a chance to rig a big sign , leave her some supplies . I 'll hold here tonight , stay with the RV .
dale_horvath If the RV is staying , I am too .
carol_peletier Thank you . Thank you both .
andrea_harrison I 'm in .
glenn_rhee Well , if you 're all staying then I'm-- .
dale_horvath Not you , Glenn . You 're going . Take Carol 's Cherokee .
glenn_rhee Me ? Why is it always me ?

dale_horvath You have to find this farm , reconnect with our people and see what 's going on . But most important , you have to get t - dog there . This is not an option . That cut has gone from bad to worse . He has a very serious blood infection . Get him to that farm . See if they have any antibiotics . Because if not , t - dog will die , no joke .

daryl_dixon Keep your oily rags off my brother 's motorcycle . Why 'd you wait till now to say anything ? Got my brother 's stash . Crystal , X. Do n't need that . Got some kick ass painkillers . Oxycycline . Not the generic stuff neither . It 's first class . Merle got the clap on occasion .
hershel_greene Pressure 's dropping again . We ca n't wait much longer .
rick_grimes Take some more . Whatever he needs . Then I 'm gon na go .
lori_grimes Go ? Go where ?
rick_grimes He said five miles . They should be long back by now . Something 's gone wrong .
lori_grimes Are you insane ? You 're not going after them .
hershel_greene Rick , listen to your wife .
rick_grimes If they got into trouble-- .
hershel_greene You 're in no condition to do anything about it . You 've given too much blood . You 're barely on your feet . You would n't make it across the yard .
rick_grimes If something happened , I have to go .
lori_grimes No , your place is here . If shane said he 'll be back , he 'll be back . He 's like you that way .
rick_grimes I ca n't just sit here .

lori_grimes That 's exactly what you do . If you need to pray or cry or tell god he 's cruel , you go right ahead , but you 're not leaving , Rick . carl needs you -- here . And I ca n't do this by myself . Not this one . I ca n't . I ca n't .
shane_walsh Is this it ?
otis Yeah , three . Three .
otis Oh here . Endotracheal intubator , baby , for my new respirator .
shane_walsh Attaboy . Come on .
shane_walsh Goddamn it . Come on ! Stay with me !
shane_walsh No -- no no no no ! Come on . No , no no no ! Come on . Come on . In here . Damn . Okay , okay . Stay back ! Stay back !
shane_walsh Damn it .
